title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Nothing clarifies how much more there is to learn about a subject as when you try to teach it. Although your intention might be to inform others, talking aloud about a recently acquired skill grounds your energy and solidifies your ideas. You not only refine your own understanding, but you can add your unique flair and thoughtful insight to the material, captivating your audience in the process. Show your colleagues a new technique you picked up from a recent workshop or a cool tidbit you gleaned from social media. Your confidence rises the more you strive for self-improvement. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
